name: OWASP Application Security Verification Standard
description: OWASP Application Security Verification Standard (ASVS) provides a basis for testing web application technical security controls

controls.title: Verify that all pages and resources require authentication except those specifically intended to be public
controls.description: All pages and resources require authentication except those specifically intended to be public
requirements: Authentication required for all protected resources
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement proper authentication controls for all protected resources while allowing public access to intended public resources.
testingProcedures: Test access to protected resources without authentication

controls.title: Verify that all password fields allow or encourage the use of long passphrases
controls.description: All password fields allow or encourage the use of long passphrases
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement password fields that support and encourage the use of long passphrases for better security.

controls.title: Verify that all authentication decisions are logged
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement comprehensive logging of all authentication decisions for security monitoring and incident response.

controls.title: Verify that all authentication controls are implemented on the server side
controls.description: All authentication controls are implemented on the server side
controls.implementationGuidance: Ensure all authentication controls are implemented on the server side for security.

controls.title: Verify that all authentication controls fail securely
controls.implementationGuidance: Implement authentication controls that fail securely without exposing sensitive information.
